extendedInfo.description: Works on ALL rooted phones!May work on some unrooted phones (i.e. the Motorola Atrix, Droid X2, Droid Bionic, Galaxy, and Tegra devices). If you are not rooted, this free version is for you to see if it works on your phone before buying the full version. If this version does not work, please download "No Root Screenshot It", which will work on your phone (also available on the Android market).Please do not rate poorly if you do not have a rooted device!5 screenshots in trialTake a screenshot of your phone's screen, save as a jpg or png file, and share anywhere!- Crop screenshots- Draw and annotate screenshots- Screen shot status bar button- Screenshot widget button- Shake to screen shot- Delayed screenshot timer- "Share" menu integration- Overlay phone information on screenshots- Specify your own custom directory to save your screenshots!To remove superuser permission toast message from your screenshots, goto your "superuser permissions" app and disable toast messages.Tags: Screenshot screen shot capture

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S
reviews.comment: Works great no complaints. Easy and fast installation. Easy instructions. Would recommend.
reviews.author: Sade\' Crosland

reviews.title: Easier way
reviews.comment: Ok  hold the middle button and the power button of your LG optimus L9 and it takes a screenshot of what ever you doing on your phone
reviews.author: Axel Garcia

reviews.title: Piece of Crap!
reviews.comment: I can\'t get this one to work unless I buy the other one. Looking for a screenshot app. Usually when something says \"trial\" it means to TRY it not BUY it!!!!! >:(
reviews.author: Pj Kalowski

reviews.title: Best Screenshooting app
reviews.comment: This free trial version is awsome nd yeah no root needed  <3 but the full version sucks and wont even work
reviews.author: Haroldo Gonzalez

reviews.title: No Root? Not True
reviews.comment: I have been searching all day for a great screenshot app that requires no root to operate and have been unsuccessful. Out of all the apps in google play,.not one works on my android.
reviews.author: Stacie Lilly

reviews.title: Xperia z
reviews.comment: Scam. Only exists to trick you into buying the full version.
reviews.author: Dani Barouch

reviews.title: cannot find the pictures!
reviews.comment: On top of not being able to find the pictures I can\'t edit them even though it\'s marked in settings and WHY do the pictures have to go to the SD card??? I would like the convenience of finding them in my gallery like all other programs so..Waste of time (Yawwwn) and VERY annoying..UNINSTALLED!
reviews.author: Lisa Contilli

reviews.title: This \"trial\" does not work for unrooted phones.
reviews.comment: There is no trial, you must buy the full price version to see how well it works. When I opened the app i immediately got an error message: Your phone does not appear to be rooted or has not been given rooting privileges. However, there is a way to take screenshots without root. Please download \'No Root Screenshot It\' from the app market, which will work on your phone.  My only option was to purchase the app. This is not what I expected from a \"free trial.\"
reviews.author: Deanna Stanford

reviews.comment: I love it! It\'s wonderful.\nBut, there is one thing that annoys me. It doesn\'t give me enough turns (I understand its a trial) but it needs more turns.

reviews.comment: My phone isnt rooted so i couldnt determine the quality of the app, but i wanted to comment for the idiots who decided not to read before downloading.
